title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus caret does not move to the first Combo 'Host:'.
EB: The focus caret should move to the first Combo 'Host:' when clicking on it.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the application.
2. Locate the first Combo element.
3. Click on the first Combo element.
